abstract: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. said he was boycotting the event on Tuesday to protest Nevada's decision to hold its caucus on Jan. 14.
snippet: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. said he was boycotting the event on Tuesday to protest Nevada's decision to hold its caucus on Jan. 14.
lead_paragraph: Jon M. Huntsman Jr. won't be at the next debate, in Las Vegas. But it's not a sleight by the organizers.

headline.main: Huntsman Will Boycott Las Vegas Debate
